review.reviewBody: The dress was not to expectations. Poor quality and workmanship. Rough edges, puckered seams, massively too big. Also sent later than agreed. Service was terrible. Offered to refund in full if dress was shipped back. Agreed to do this and then some weeks later the seller changed their mind and said they would only refund half and I could keep the dress. When I replied that I would prefer a full refund they they responded by saying it was months after I ordered and what did I expect. Unacceptable. Unfortunately the worst experience on Etsy I have encountered. I hope things reform and improve.

My experience with "Libaasbyanam" didn't fully meet my expectations. While Anam provided initial guidance, the dress differed from the images and didn't fit as hoped. 

Navigating the return and refund process was a bit challenging due to the 14-day return policy. The request for a 5-star review to process the refund was unexpected.

Spending $250+, including shipping and customs, made the experience more stressful. It's worth nothing the dress wasn't accepted on delivery despite multiple attempts.

In hindsight, I discovered similar dresses on other sites at lower prices. My advice to potential buyers is to research thoroughly before purchase. Trust and clarity make for a smoother customer-seller relationship.

Best,

Customer from Germany

review.reviewBody:
I ordered the color #2 (ivory) and received an ill fitting champagne dress. I informed the seller of the color error, and she stood firm in saying she sent an ivory dress! I told her I wanted a refund and after a month of asking, she tells me that I am now outside of the refund window! Unfortunately, it was bought for an all-white party, so it was completely useless. I continued to ask for a refund, and she would not give it to me. I tried returning it, but shipping costs to India is $300 USD. Long story short, I wasted my time and money, all while receiving horrible customer service.

She also repeatedly bribed me with a refund in exchange for a five-star review. I have since blocked her. I caution everyone that wants to purchase from this seller.
